title: 5 money tasks with deadline of March, 2022: Is your personal finance on track? - Economic Times
content:
1. 5 money tasks with deadline of March, 2022: Is your personal finance on track?  Economic Times
  2. Five finance-related tasks you should complete before March 31  DNA India
  3. Personal finance checklist: 7 things to do before March 31  Business Today
  4. Personal Finance Checklist: Things to do before March 31  Dalal Street Investment Journal
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The latest money or income tax deadline to have passed was on March 15, 2022, which was to submit the last advance tax instalment. Advance tax is paid in four instalments as and when money is generated, rather than at the end of the fiscal year. The remaining balance or last instalment is due by March 15.Next deadline falls on March 31, 2022. As March, 2022 nears it end, so does the financial year and with it, some personal finance activities that have a deadline for end of March. Here are five such personal finance tasks to complete before March, 2022 ends. â€‹Money calendar checklist
